citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on
16-Dec-16.
* Upon arrival inspector found front gate locked. Inspector then honked horn and called telephone numbers given
by the licensee. Inspector waited required 30 minute time for licensee to show up.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on
16-Dec-16.
*  Upon arrival inspector found front gate locked.  Inspector then honked horn and called telephone numbers given
by the licensee.  Inspector waited required 30 minute time for licensee to show up.  
*   Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.
